text_block_list.name: Airplane Researcher
text_block_list.text:
…… The aircraft from that experiment, huh? 
I haven't recovered it because I can't.

text_block_list.name: Airplane Researcher
text_block_list.text:
These things require special towing vehicles, you know. 
Master did modify a car for— But he quit after that flight…

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: You can't ask him to even just help retrieve it?

text_block_list.name: Airplane Researcher
text_block_list.text:
Oh no… I couldn't bother him with such a thing… 
The… reason that plane crashed was because 
of an idea of mine.

text_block_list.name: Airplane Researcher
text_block_list.text:
It's all my fault…… 
I'm the one who drove him to walk away……

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
I see, so that is why the past research has not been 
applied to the current machine.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Hayahide, Taishin! You're back!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Yes. …I've been reading over the research in between 
requests. It has given me a decent grasp of the current state.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Nothing beats the actual machine though. I think we should 
go look for a towing vehicle and bring that plane back here. 
It would surely be a great boon to our research.

text_block_list.name: Airplane Researcher
text_block_list.text:
But…… having already taken away his dreams… 
I can't go and take his hard work as well……

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
You're just making excuses, are you not? 
… In reality, you don't want to see that plane again.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: ―You are running away from facing your failures!!

text_block_list.name: Airplane Researcher
text_block_list.text: Wha… I'm not! I'm trying not to trample master's wishes…!

text_block_list.name: Airplane Researcher
text_block_list.text:
It was such a horrible failure, we didn't even bring it back! 
…I'm sure he doesn't want to see that thing either!!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Do you really believe that? Then all the more reason you 
should look back through his research and see the reality! 
It's written rig—

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Whoa, whoa, what's up, Hayahide!? 
You sound a little worked up…!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
Hayahide, why don't you take a breather. 
.…… You too.

text_block_list.name: Airplane Researcher
text_block_list.text: Yes…… sorry…… I just got emotional……

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
My apologies, too… 
I'm going to go cool off a bit……

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Eh… hang on, Hayahide! 
—Excuse me a moment!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
I'm sure her mentor quitting weighs on her, but she 
continues to avert her eyes from past failures.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
And yet, she is the one who most should know. 
The long road her mentor walked, held within that machine…

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
The tremendous efforts of her mentor laid bare in that 
research. Even I could see and admire that. She should…

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Come to think of it, you were obsessively delving through all that. So that was actually useful.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Of course. Those were the results of years of hard work. 
I knew I could not let that effort come to naught……!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
He faced his failures, squashing all problems and leveraging 
them in the next attempts. No matter how many times he 
crashed down… he reformulated a path to success!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
And little by little, through all the failures, he progressed 
further! The results were clearly there!!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Not reaching your dreams does not mean your efforts 
were in vain. Success is made from many failures! 
They are part of the history of anything!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
I believe we should implement her mentor's 
research and results in the new plane. 
— If she will not do it, then we will.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
We'll meet her mentor, borrow that tow truck, 
and recover that plane!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
…Hold it. …Her mentor's retired, right? 
Even she didn't seem to want to get him involved…

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
If that mentor's trying to move past this, 
maybe we're better off to leave her alone?

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
… I know I don't want to remember my lost races. 
The only thing on my mind is winning the next one… 
to overwrite the losses with victories.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
…… No, I think it is worthwhile to reflect on the past. 
All efforts pay off, and that is true regardless of 
the arena in which you fight.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
That is what it means to build on your past, does it not? 
There are things gained from failure.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: … I guess that's true for you.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Hmm… so, wanna go talk to this mentor person? 
Just be careful with our wording!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
I don't think she'll be truly happy like this, even when the 
experiment succeeds! So I wanna go talk to her mentor!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
True!! We won't know how he feels 
if we don't talk to him either!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
Umm, umm… Turbo wants to fly a plane!! 
If having the old plane is good then let's grab it!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: ……… Sure.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Then let's be off to… uhh, where do we go!?

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
Me, me! Turbo knows!! 
Mentor's a train repair tech-ni-tian…? at the station!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Wah!? How do you know, Turbo!?

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
'Cause I asked a bunch of stuff about the plane when 
I did deliveries! They told me about mentor too!!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Awesome! Great work!!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
Ehehen, Turbo will lead you to mentor! 
Follow meee!
